translateItemList.chi: 尝试上一个挑战来解锁。

translateItemList.eng: 0: Training
Learn the basics of DUELYST II.
1: The Elemental Secrets
Learn mechanics and earn rewards by enjoying these solo challenges. Difficulty: Beginner
translateItemList.chi: 学习技巧，通过单人挑战获取奖励。难度：初级

translateItemList.eng: 2: The Realm of Dreams
New solo challenges and rewards! Difficulty: Intermediate
translateItemList.chi: 新的单人挑战喝奖励！ 难度：中级

translateItemList.eng: 3: Trials of the Seven Stars
Embark on more exciting solo challenges! Difficulty: Intermediate
translateItemList.chi: 开始更多精彩的单人挑战！难度：中级

translateItemList.eng: 4: The Vault of Generations
Another set of fun solo challenges! Difficulty: Advanced
translateItemList.chi: 另一组有趣的单人挑战！难度：高级

translateItemList.eng: 5: The Adeptus Gate
You've earned it! Now for some tougher challenges. Difficulty: Advanced
translateItemList.chi: 如你所愿！现在是一些更严峻的挑战。难度：高级

translateItemList.eng: 6: Trials of the Seven Stars
Experience the first Trial of Champions. Difficulty: Hard
translateItemList.chi: 体验冠军的第一次试炼。难度：困难

translateItemList.eng: 7: The Adeptus Gate
To acquire knowledge, one must study; but to acquire wisdom, one must observe. Difficulty: Hard
translateItemList.chi: 要获得知识，只需学习。但要获得智慧，必须观察。难度：困难

translateItemList.eng: 8: Sacred Path to Aperion
The voyage of discovery is not in seeking new landscapes but in having new eyes. Difficulty: Hard
translateItemList.chi: 探索之旅不在于寻找新的风景，而在于拥有新的眼界。难度：困难

translateItemList.eng: 9: The Tacticians' Contest
Created for the community, by the community. Difficulty: Expert
10: The Contest of Grandmasters
Extremely challenging. Good luck. Difficulty: Insane
translateItemList.chi: 极具挑战性。祝你好运。难度：疯狂
